page.title: 04CHARFORD SHOPS, BROMSGROVE
page.content: {Eight 6yr olds}visited and interview- ed shopkeepers of{8 shops}at Charford. A central group on Humphrey Avenue of {Dress shop,P.O/Newsagent, Greengrocer, {DIY, Butcher and Grocer/Off Licence have maisonettes above. Vans deliver stock to the rear storerooms on a road behind.The newsagent opens at 6.30am and papers are delivered to the shop front door from 4.am,then to houses,or sold in the shop.Children often buy an apple or orange at the greengrocers before school to take for their lunch and shops are often busiest before and after school:9.am and 3.30pm.Two shops serve the SW of Charford at Austin Road,a{Grocers}and{Fish and Chip shop. Each week the chip shop uses 500 papers to wrap chips,60 of 25kg bags of potatoes,4-5 containers of vinegar, each 2.25 gallon,10lb salt and, daily, 3-4 boxes of vegetable fat.
